endpoints.description: Retrieve real-time data for all monitored renewable energy installations.
Submit a request for predictive maintenance schedule generation for a specified installation.
Obtain a summarized performance report for all managed renewable energy sources to identify trends.
Access detailed efficiency analytics for a targeted renewable energy system.
Update configuration settings of a specific device within the renewable energy network.
Define custom alert triggers for anomalies detected in energy production or equipment functioning.
View historical records of alerts and triggers for all systems.
Remove outdated and non-relevant historical performance data from the database.
Retrieve analysis of weather data impact on energy production from connected systems.
Share aggregate analytical insights with selected stakeholders for collaborative evaluation.
